name: ProjectShitlord - Greg & PD 2 (BETA 2019/11/24)
description:
Greg & P.D. (Greg & Pussy Destroyer) is a shitty sequel to a shitty game about a bear with a pigeon duct taped to his back. He exists because the developer’s previous idea bottomed out at the last minute, and his superiors made him clone Banjo Kazooie Nuts & Bolts.  After their harrowing battle with the mighty Duane Gif in Shitpost Hell™, Greg & PD must face their most dangerous challenge yet: A journey through the perilous Lair of the Dead Meme.

Controls:

WASD: Move
LMB: Throw car
Space: Jump
E: Interact
Esc: Pause
